Text: Jihofa, e̩ narewa ukata Defid, ku ma chi le̩ chaka;
kakini, Nagudu wʼef unyabo unyi-mi n
nahi eju-mi de kʼu lolu n
gbogbo tak u fʼugbo kʼi agugu li todu Jihofa,
Awa ki nyʼugbo kʼi agugu le̩;
O Jihofa, kwane̩ kʼe̩ nyʼef uña uñmi-we̩,
E̩ ki je̩ ñw amatama-we̩ kʼo̩kpakpa bʼo̩la ma,
Jihofa go̩ ñw Defid, ego̩-wñ chʼochochi
Uña uñmi-mi gbogbo alo i che;
Omi ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩la o̩de̩-wñ chuu;
U ñʼakʼujadu bʼo̩la amatama-wñ ma ge̩,
O̩mo̩ naje̩ ñw igba Defid ki tiga dufu;
